body:
@SatanicBeef Good ending? This isn't even the ending and...well...it's not good.

@TruthTeller This moment isn't even good...it's just sad for the MC knowing this girl will never change. Wonder if she even really loves him. Only salvageable ending to this is the same as would be for any NTR story...the MC drops the slut and finds a better girl that actually cares about him, herself, and isn't weak-minded. Bonus points if the cheating whore has the MC's newfound happiness shoved in her face and she despairs.

@JamesDillHole No, he's not okay with it. Later he becomes much colder toward her after learning SOME of what she's done. Hopefully(if this story even continues), he helps her(because you shouldn't just desert someone in need of help...especially when it's concerned with life and death) and drops her for some better girl. Though...I'm starting to wonder if there even are better girls in this manga. Mangaka seems to have some fucked up ideas about women...

Can this little whore even get pregnant? Anyways, I think the guy already knows what's she's been doing and he's okay with it. Some guys are just okay with being a beta male and taking care of some other guy's kids for them, but if they're happy than good for them I guess.
well he confess, but isnt the girl already pregnant with the teacher who killed?
this entire series is garbage NTR this is the only good moment ffs
They should add a 'happy ending' tag, for people like me who don't read to fap, but read to feel.
Finally...that confession was long overdue...now hopefully they solve this mystery soon.
